name: Gmail: Hide Report as Spam, Delete & Refresh
description:
Gmail: Hide Report as Spam, Delete & Refresh buttons

This is especially useful when Multiple Inboxes are enabled at the right side.
Disable the user style for doing the occasional 'Report as Spam' (e.g. through the Stylish icon in the bottom-right corner).
additional_info:
Tested in Firefox 3.6 on 29 May 2011.

Thanks to user 169 for showing me CSS' DIV[]-construction.
